Interface ec.id.CapabilityReceiver

Implementing Classes:
PalaceCapabilityReceiver, Receiver, QAReceiver
public abstract interface CapabilityReceiver
Interface for notification upon completion of a capability request/delivery protocol. Implementers of this interface, provided to the identity-based capability exchange protocol, will be notified when/if the desired capability is delivered by the requested Identity object.

Author:
Scott B. Lewis, slewis@communities.com

Method Summary
void receiveCapability(Object capability)
          Receive a capability object from a remote.
 

Method Detail

receiveCapability

public void receiveCapability(Object capability)
Receive a capability object from a remote. This method is called by the CapabilityReceipt instance to notify the implementer about the arrival of a new capability associated with the receipt.
Parameters:
capability - the actual reference to the desired capability
